title: The Leap Year Explained

options.text: To account for the extra quarter day in a year

options.label: C
options.text: To correct for the overcorrection of leap days

options.text: To align the calendar with the number of days in a solar year

options.text: To keep the calendar in sync with the number of days in a year

options.text: Because it is a century year divisible by 400

options.text: To account for the extra quarter day in a year

options.label: B
options.text: To correct for the overcorrection of leap days

options.text: To keep the calendar in sync with the number of days in a year
